quotes.quote: Backstabbers specialize in saying the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.
If evil be spoken of you and it be true, correct yourself, if it be a lie, laugh at it.
Your life must be filled with such incredible loneliness that your only joy comes from destroying everyone else's happiness.
You know that you have been stabbed when you feel the deep pain of betrayal
False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us when we cross into the shade.
You may shoot me with your words, you may cut me with your eyes, you may kill me with your hatefulness, but still, like air, I'll rise.

There are many backstabbing friends who in your hard time will ignore you, without to ask something from them. You just are filled with sadness and they don't confide in you anymore. The downside of your hard time is being considered rude, negative, boorish and insistent.
Be certain that he who has betrayed thee once will betray thee again.
No one ever really pays for betrayal in silver.... The price of any betrayal always comes due in flesh.
Betrayal does that -- betrays the betrayer.
It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
It was a mistake,  you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
It's hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it?.

Trust is a fragile thing once earned, it affords us tremendous freedom but once trust is lost, it can be impossible to recover of course the truth is, we never know who we can trust. Those we're closest to can betray us.
Be careful to whom you trust. Betrayal always come from the persons you trusted.
We can tolerate our true enemies, but not the back stabbers and betrayers.
Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
I would never betray a friend to serve a cause. Never reject a friend to help an institution. Great nations may fall in ruin before I would sell a friend to save them.
FIDELITY, n. A virtue peculiar to those who are about to be betrayed.
When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
There are three signs of a hypocrite: when he speaks he speaks lies, when he makes a promise he breaks it, and when he is trusted he betrays his trust.
We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
An open enemy is better than a false friend
One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though ... betrayal is the willful slaughter of hope.
They talk of a man betraying his country, his friends, his sweetheart. There must be a moral bond first. All a man can betray is his conscience.
If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.

There must be love, and understanding, to betray. Most men haven't the wit or the honor for betrayal: not to know it when they see it; not the stomach to apprehend it as they do it. Most men, blind and dumb in their self-centeredness, don't betray: they merely disappoint.

People are complicated creatures. On the one hand, able to perform great acts of charity. On the other, capable of the most underhanded forms of betrayal. It's a constant battle that rages within all of us.
To understand loyalty you need to experience betrayal.
A man who trusts can never be betrayed, only mistaken.
True friends stab you in the front.
Backstabbing, especially from close friends and family, is extremely devastating.
Stabbed from behind / am I really that blind. / No matter what you do / the pain leads back to you / No matter how I try / I still cry / You were there / and now you just don't care.
After all that I've done / you now have lost a ton. / After everything that has happened / I'm really quite finished / with backstabbing friends / waiting for me to diminish.
No matter what I do the pain keeps coming / Every smile turns to tears. / Every friend becomes an enemy. / My heart bleeds and no one sees / how much it hurts.
Backstabbing is more vicious form of gossip and depending on the precise definition, we could also say that backstabbing occurs a whole lot, too.
I don't even understand how it happened. We were all best friends one day, and then it seemed like overnight, everything changed.
Don't flirt with someone one of your friend's likes. It's backstabbing your friend.

I wish to be accepted for just who and what I am; / I wish so-called friends would not laugh in my face while behind / my back gossiping; I'd wish for true friendship / not a joke; This is how I feel; I can't speak for other folks.
So I'd wish all the backstabbing friends in this world would be given a mirror, so they could turn their judgemental eyes on themselves.
We cannot exalt a friend in his or her face and then turn around to gossip about their predicaments.
Backstabbing is unproductive, u healthy, and an inexcusable tool that often destroys amity.
Those who indulge in backstabbing, are those who lack the courage and the boldness to confront their friend's activities face to face.
Thine own friend, and thy father's friend; forsake not.
To resent injuries under the disguise of friendship and benevolence argues a degeneracy at which common humanity and justice must blush.
Betrayal is never easy to handle and there is no right way to accept it.
The worst pain in the world goes beyond the physical. Even further beyond any other emotional pain, one can feel. It is the betrayal of a friend.
Faithful are the wounds of a friend, but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
Betray a friend and you'll often find you have ruined yourself.
Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.
He who throws away a friend is as bad as he who throws away his life.
Dealing with backstabbers, there was one thing I learned. They're only powerful when you got your back turned.
Best Friends has 11 letters, but so does Backstabber.
Sometimes your dearest friend whom you reveal most of your secrets to becomes so deadly and unfriendly without knowing that they were not really your friend.
It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
I am grateful to those who have betrayed me… They thought they were just stabbing me in the back, but they were also cutting me free from their poisonous life.
All trust involves vulnerability and risk, and nothing would count as trust if there were no possibility of betrayal.
I could never hurt him enough to make his betrayal stop hurting. And it hurts, in every part of my body.
